especially in the county 's eastern corner . whitstable is the pearl in the crown of england 's oyster industry - the place where tens of thousands of cultivated oysters are bred , grown and harvested for sale at london 's billingsgate market and beyond . shingle-coated beaches and small weathered cottages provide a quiet atmosphere far removed from the candyfloss and pier shows of southend . whitstable is all about seafood and you 'll find oyster-selling restaurants by the dozen . among them are the internationally acclaimed crab and winkle restaurant and wheelers oyster bar -
